name: appetizer
description: ˈapɪtʌɪzə. a small dish of food or a drink taken before a meal or the main course of a meal to stimulate one's appetite.

name: entrée
description: ˈɒntreɪ. a meal eaten in the middle of the day, typically one that is lighter or less formal than an evening meal.

name: dessert
description: dɪˈzəːt. noun. the sweet course eaten at the end of a meal.
